snippet: Also, new media hopes in The Daily and BuzzFeed, and newspapers find hope in video.
abstract: Also, new media hopes in The Daily and BuzzFeed, and newspapers find hope in video.
lead_paragraph: In a twist, an exciting Super Bowl game was matched by a rather ordinary collection of commercials, Stuart Elliott writes. The game usually disappoints, while offering a platform for the most creative ads of the year - why, it's the Super Bowl for commercials! Instead, the ads offered many retread ideas and stars, including the rap jester Flava Flav, chimpanzees dressed as people, Donald J. Trump and talking babies. Among the best ads, he writes, were serious ones from Chrysler, narrated by Clint Eastwood during halftime, and a Best Buy spot about technological innovators.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: In Ads, Super Bowl Was Humdrum, Though Madonna Came to Play

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
